data.message: Trying to share some love with family in different cities/states...WHY AM I NOT SEEING THEIR POSTS???

replies.message: Hey Sandi. You can use “See First” to make sure you never miss a post from your friends or family. You won't receive a notification when your friends post. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2dWVHSb. -Jessica
